title: Enhance UI with modern design and smooth animations

requirements.summary: Add smooth page transition animations when switching between sections in the bottom navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Sections fade in or slide in smoothly when navigated to
Transitions are performant on mobile devices
Animation duration is between 200-400ms

file_operations.description: Wrap the section content rendering with Framer Motion AnimatePresence and motion.div to add fade-in/slide-in transitions when switching between sections. Use key prop based on activeSection to trigger animations. Set transition duration between 200-400ms and apply initial/animate/exit variants for smooth enter/exit effects.

requirements.summary: Implement micro-interactions for all interactive elements with hover/active states and transitions
acceptanceCriteria: All buttons show visual feedback on press/hover with smooth transitions
Form inputs have animated focus indicators
List items and cards have subtle hover effects
Animations respect user's prefers-reduced-motion setting

file_operations.description: Add global utility classes for micro-interactions: button hover/active scale and color transitions, input focus ring animations, card hover lift effects. Include @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) query to disable animations for accessibility. Define transition durations and easing functions for consistent feel across all interactive elements.
Add Tailwind transition and transform classes to enable hover scale effect and smooth color transitions on the login/logout button. Apply active:scale-95 for press feedback.
Enhance navigation button interactive states with transition-all duration-200 and hover:scale-110 for icon scaling. Add smooth color transitions for active/inactive states.
Add hover effects to bookmark cards with transition-transform and hover:scale-102 classes. Apply smooth transitions to action buttons within cards.
Add hover effects to saved content cards with transition-transform and hover:scale-102 classes. Apply smooth transitions to action buttons within cards.
Add hover effects to idea cards with transition-transform and hover:scale-102 classes. Apply smooth transitions to action buttons within cards.
Add hover effects to reminder cards with transition-transform and hover:scale-102 classes. Apply smooth transitions to action buttons and checkbox interactions.
Add animated focus states to form inputs using focus:ring-2 and transition-all classes. Include smooth color transitions for focus indicators.
Add animated focus states to form inputs using focus:ring-2 and transition-all classes. Include smooth color transitions for focus indicators.
Add animated focus states to textarea using focus:ring-2 and transition-all classes. Include smooth color transitions for focus indicators.
Add animated focus states to form inputs using focus:ring-2 and transition-all classes. Include smooth color transitions for focus indicators.
Add animated focus states to profile setup form inputs using focus:ring-2 and transition-all classes. Include smooth color transitions for focus indicators.

requirements.summary: Add staggered fade-in animations for list items when rendering saved content, bookmarks, ideas, and reminders lists
acceptanceCriteria: List items animate in with a stagger delay (each item appears slightly after the previous one)
Animation is smooth and does not cause layout shift
Works consistently across all list views

file_operations.description: Wrap the bookmarks list with Framer Motion's motion.div and apply stagger children animations. Use initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}, animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}, and transition with staggerChildren delay of 0.05s per item for smooth sequential fade-in effect.

Wrap the saved content list with Framer Motion's motion.div and apply stagger children animations. Use initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}, animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}, and transition with staggerChildren delay of 0.05s per item for smooth sequential fade-in effect.

Wrap the ideas list with Framer Motion's motion.div and apply stagger children animations. Use initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}, animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}, and transition with staggerChildren delay of 0.05s per item for smooth sequential fade-in effect.

Wrap the reminders list with Framer Motion's motion.div and apply stagger children animations. Use initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }}, animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}, and transition with staggerChildren delay of 0.05s per item for smooth sequential fade-in effect.

requirements.summary: Implement smooth modal/dialog entrance and exit animations for all form dialogs
acceptanceCriteria: Dialogs scale in and fade in when opening
Dialogs scale out and fade out when closing
Backdrop fades in/out smoothly
Animations are synchronized and feel polished

file_operations.description: Add Framer Motion animations to the Dialog component: wrap DialogContent with motion.div using initial={{ opacity: 0, scale: 0.95 }}, animate={{ opacity: 1, scale: 1 }}, and exit={{ opacity: 0, scale: 0.95 }} with 200ms duration. Ensure AnimatePresence wraps the dialog for exit animations.

Add Framer Motion animations to the Dialog component: wrap DialogContent with motion.div using initial={{ opacity: 0, scale: 0.95 }}, animate={{ opacity: 1, scale: 1 }}, and exit={{ opacity: 0, scale: 0.95 }} with 200ms duration. Ensure AnimatePresence wraps the dialog for exit animations.

Add Framer Motion animations to the Dialog component: wrap DialogContent with motion.div using initial={{ opacity: 0, scale: 0.95 }}, animate={{ opacity: 1, scale: 1 }}, and exit={{ opacity: 0, scale: 0.95 }} with 200ms duration. Ensure AnimatePresence wraps the dialog for exit animations.

Add Framer Motion animations to the Dialog component: wrap DialogContent with motion.div using initial={{ opacity: 0, scale: 0.95 }}, animate={{ opacity: 1, scale: 1 }}, and exit={{ opacity: 0, scale: 0.95 }} with 200ms duration. Ensure AnimatePresence wraps the dialog for exit animations.

Add Framer Motion animations to the Dialog component: wrap DialogContent with motion.div using initial={{ opacity: 0, scale: 0.95 }}, animate={{ opacity: 1, scale: 1 }}, and exit={{ opacity: 0, scale: 0.95 }} with 200ms duration. Ensure AnimatePresence wraps the dialog for exit animations.

requirements.summary: Add loading state animations with skeleton loaders or pulse animations for content that is loading
acceptanceCriteria: Loading states show animated skeletons or pulse effects
Content fades in smoothly when loaded
Loading animations are consistent across all sections

file_operations.description: Create a reusable SkeletonLoader component that renders animated skeleton placeholders using Tailwind's animate-pulse utility. Support variants for card, list-item, and text skeletons. Export SkeletonCard and SkeletonList sub-components for common patterns.
Replace loading state with SkeletonLoader component that shows animated skeleton cards while bookmarks are being fetched. Wrap loaded content in motion.div with fade-in animation when data arrives.

Replace loading state with SkeletonLoader component that shows animated skeleton cards while saved content is being fetched. Wrap loaded content in motion.div with fade-in animation when data arrives.
Replace loading state with SkeletonLoader component that shows animated skeleton cards while ideas are being fetched. Wrap loaded content in motion.div with fade-in animation when data arrives.
Replace loading state with SkeletonLoader component that shows animated skeleton cards while reminders are being fetched. Wrap loaded content in motion.div with fade-in animation when data arrives.

Replace loading state with SkeletonLoader component that shows animated skeleton form fields while business card data is being fetched. Wrap loaded content in motion.div with fade-in animation when data arrives.

requirements.summary: Modernize the visual design with updated typography, refined spacing, and contemporary card/container styles
acceptanceCriteria: Typography follows a clear hierarchy with distinct heading and body text styles
Spacing between elements feels balanced and modern
Cards and containers have refined visual treatments (shadows, borders, or subtle gradients)
Overall design feels contemporary and polished

file_operations.description: Enhance typography scale with larger, bolder heading styles (h1-h6) using modern font weights (600-800) and improved line heights. Add utility classes for refined spacing scale (space-y-6, space-y-8, etc.). Define modern card styles with subtle shadows, rounded corners, and optional gradient overlays. Update color tokens if needed for contemporary palette.

Extend Tailwind theme with refined typography scale, modern font sizes (text-3xl, text-4xl for headings), updated spacing scale, enhanced shadow utilities (shadow-soft, shadow-elevated), and contemporary color palette extensions if needed. Configure container queries and responsive breakpoints for balanced layouts.
Update Header component with larger, bolder section titles using new typography classes (text-2xl font-bold). Apply refined spacing and modern visual treatments with subtle shadows or borders.

Update bookmark cards with refined visual styles: apply modern shadow utilities, rounded-xl corners, improved padding (p-6), and clear typography hierarchy for titles and metadata. Ensure consistent spacing between cards.

Update saved content cards with refined visual styles: apply modern shadow utilities, rounded-xl corners, improved padding (p-6), and clear typography hierarchy for titles and metadata. Ensure consistent spacing between cards.
Update idea cards with refined visual styles: apply modern shadow utilities, rounded-xl corners, improved padding (p-6), and clear typography hierarchy. Ensure consistent spacing between cards.

Update reminder cards with refined visual styles: apply modern shadow utilities, rounded-xl corners, improved padding (p-6), and clear typography hierarchy for content and due dates. Ensure consistent spacing between cards.
Update business card display and form with modern typography hierarchy (larger headings, clear labels), refined spacing, and contemporary container styles with subtle shadows and rounded corners.

requirements.summary: Add animated empty state illustrations with subtle motion like floating or pulsing
acceptanceCriteria: Empty state images have subtle CSS animations (float, pulse, or gentle movement)
Animations loop smoothly
Animations do not distract from the message

file_operations.description: Add Framer Motion animation to the empty state image with subtle floating effect using animate={{ y: [-10, 10, -10] }} with smooth easing and 3s duration for infinite loop. Apply transition={{ repeat: Infinity, duration: 3, ease: 'easeInOut' }}. Ensure animation respects prefers-reduced-motion by conditionally applying based on matchMedia query.

Add custom keyframe animations for empty state effects: define 'float' animation with vertical movement and 'pulse-soft' for subtle scaling. Configure animation utilities (animate-float, animate-pulse-soft) with appropriate durations and easing functions.
